metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010057 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: nfdump 1.6.16 and earlier is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is:The impact could range from a denial of service to local code execution.The component is: nfx.c:546, nffile_inline.c:83, minilzo.c (redistributed).The attack vector is: nfdump must read and process a specially craftedfile. The fixed version is: after commit9f0fe9563366f62a71d34c92229da3432ec5cf0e.

criterions.comment: nfdump: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
